name: The Smile Epidemic
tag_list: hr, professional-development, psychology, happiness, success, positivity
overview:
The Smile Epidemic helps people and organizations to build the psychological character traits of the happiest, flourishing people. SaaS training tools are focused on developing gratitude, empathy, hopefulness, optimism and more using a daily online engagement. Outcomes are made available to both management and employees as a means of building more positive communication amongst co-workers and generating increased focus on the strengths of individuals.

The Smile Epidemic also features a free consumer facing app that helps individuals record and share daily gratitude and happiness through photographs.
